General.Name: Lan Fa Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Lan Fa Textile Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells polyester textured yarn. The company offers knitted fabrics and polyester textured silk; manufacturing and auto-controlled equipment; and omni-distance automated product supervision and control system. It also provides semigloss, non-gloss, and gloss yarns; and superfine fibers for use in buckskin textile fabrics. In addition, the company offers compounded fibers, such as CD series, contracted yarns, and fat-thin yarns for use in skirts and trousers materials, suits, out wear, tatting and knitting, imitation suedes, jackets, and tricolor yarns. Further, it provides functional fibers, including hygroscopic and perspiration yarns used in sport and golf suits, female underwear and bras, shirt jackets, hats, socks, gloves, kneecaps, waist shields, and knitting and plain weaving; hollow warm-keep yarns used in winter clothes, feather coats, and sport suits; anti-ultraviolet yarns for use in anti-ultraviolet textile fabrics; and difficult flammable yarns used in indoor home-bunting and decoration materials for cars. The company is also involved in trading of cloth and textiles, as well as residential rental and sale business. Lan Fa Textile Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.73, Huanhe N. Rd, Taipei, Taiwan, 103
